statements: DELETE FROM orders WHERE order_id = 100 AND customer_id = 200
DELETE FROM orders WHERE delivery_status = 'Pending' AND order_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM orders WHERE order_id = 101 AND order_status = 'Pending';
DELETE FROM order_items WHERE order_id = (SELECT order_id FROM orders WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe') AND price > 100.00;
DELETE FROM Orders WHERE order_id = 1001 AND customer_id = 5001;
DELETE FROM Customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM order_items WHERE order_id = 2001 AND product_id IN (3001, 3002);
